scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development "yarn lint && yarn dict && nuxt"
scripts.dev:host: cross-env NODE_ENV=development "yarn lint && yarn dict && nuxt --hostname 0.0.0.0"
scripts.dev:server: yarn lint && yarn dict && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nuxt --hostname 0.0.0.0 --port 3333
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production "yarn lint && yarn dict && nuxt build"
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production "yarn lint && yarn dict && nuxt start"
scripts.generate: cross-env NODE_ENV=production "yarn lint && yarn dict && nuxt generate"
